summary: A young woman's body is found frozen in a ditch. Through flashbacks and interviews, we see the events that led to her inevitable death.
cast: Sandrine Bonnaire|Setti Ramdane|Francis Balchère|Jean-Louis Perletti|Urbain Causse|Christophe Alcazar|Dominique Durand|Joël Fosse|Patrick Schmit|Daniel Bos|Katy Champaud|Raymond Roulle|Henri Fridlani|Patrick Sokol|Pierre Imbert|Richard Imbert|Marthe Jarnias|Yolande Moreau|Gabriel Mariani|Patrick Lepcynski|Sylvain|Sabine|Michèle Doumèche|Pierette Soler|Macha Méril|Pierre Emonnot|Stéphane Freiss|Laurence Cortadellas|Emmanuel Protopopoff|Vincent Sanchez|'Garibaldi' Fernández|Michel Constantial|Alain Roussel|Yahiaoui Assouna|Aimée Chisci|Marguerite Chisci|Geneviève Bonfils|Christian Chessa|Setina Arhab|Jacques Berthier|Oliver Jongerlynck|Rémi Leboucq|Jean Dambrin|Bébert Samcir
title: Sin techo ni ley
